alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:34PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Latah, northwestern Nez Perce, northeastern Garfield, southeastern Whitman and northeastern Asotin Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 234 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clarkston, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Clarkston, Genesee, Clarkston Heights-Vineland, West Clarkston-Highland, Asotin, Colton, Uniontown, Clarkston Heights, and Jerry. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 304 and 340. U.S. Highway 12 in Idaho between mile markers 0 and 12. U.S. Highway 12 in Washington between mile markers 417 and 434. U.S. Highway 195 in Washington between mile markers 0 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
